533570.name: The Silver Case: The Extra Contents
533570.description:
*You can find the downloaded files in the local folder beside the game executables.

Artbook

Original and revised artworks combined into one exclusive artbook!

Comic

The hidden story between Moonlight Syndrome and The Silver Case, "Pre-Lunatics".
